Name: Speech or presentation
Description: A particular speaking event with aÂ place, time. Includes debates, public discussions, lectures, addresses, presentations, roundtable discussions.

Properties.Name: Date
Properties.Description: The date the presentation was given. This may be slightly different than the date of the speaking event, in that a speaking event may occur over several days. It also allows the date of a speech to be recorded without there being a related speaking event.

Properties.Name: Presented work
Properties.Description: Use if its text has its own topic - eg. gettysberg address, which has been read many times

Properties.Name: Type or format of presentation
Properties.Description: Type of presentation' - roundtable discussion, televised address...
